page.title: 20SCIENCE AND TECHNOLOGY
page.content: SCIENCE AND TECHNOLOGY PLAY AND IMPORTANT PART IN THIS REGION . THE COMPUTER IS PROBABLY THE MOST NOTICEABLE AND IMPORTANT CHANGE IN PEOPLES LIVES IN RECENT TIMES. A THIRD OF ALL HOMES AND ALMOST ALL OF THE BUSINESSES HAVE A COMPUTER. THE LOCAL GARAGES HAVE HIGHLY SOPHISTICATED COMPUTERISED EQUIPMENT TO TEST ENGINES. ONE LOCAL FIRM COTROLS MANY ASPECTS OF HIS BUSINESS ON MACHINERY LINKED TO VIDEO DISCS. ALMOST ALL THE MACHINES IN THE ENGINEERING FACTORIES ARE COMPUTERISED. FARMING IS ALSO HIGHLY MECHANISED, WITH ONE FARMER SOWING TURNIP SEEDS BY AEROPLANE. MODERN PESTICIDES ARE USED TO GREAT EFFECT, BUT CAUSE CONCERN LOCALLY OWING TO THEIR TOXIC NATURE.
